data.message: You're pathetic. Insulting a person and his family to garner attention for yourself. And then people praise you for it? Lack of morals in this country. Lack of respect, dignity, social acceptance. Being courteous doesn't exist. Being logical is lost. Being a tool, a hater, envious, saying that someone is a piece of shit and using it to reawaken your non-existent presence in 10+ years proves that you have no idea what you are talk- sorry rapping about. Get a job Eminem, i liked you more when you were being funny as Slim Shady.

replies.message: he didnt insult a person, he insulted a piece of shit
Ya whatever. A piece of shit insulting a piece of shit. The last person to call out Trump is a dying rapper. This was a publicity stunt to become known again because he. Did. It. For. Himself.
That piece of shit you are talking about already left months ago.

Wow " Lack of morals in this country. Lack of respect, dignity, social acceptance. Being courteous doesn't exist. Being logical is lost. Being a tool, a hater, envious" THAT DESCRIBES DONALD TRUMP :O!
Pretty sure "grabbing woman by the pussy" is lack of morals....
F*** Donald Trump and snowflake Republicans whiny little b******
I seriously read almost half of this before realizing it was Em you describe Trump to a tee.. fuckin sheep lol

You're fricking hilarious-lack of respect,dignity ECT ECT. Really! Please. He calls out everyone from time to time and NOW YOU'RE OFFENDED! President Trump is not special! Maybe he'd get some respect if he would stop doing stupid things and the job at hand. Instead of deflecting and distracting. I think its time to take away political names and let the sheep fall.
You liked him better as Slim??? Are you serious lmao you're a fake fan if you're offended now.
You must be speaking of Trump
but you support trump who has literally disrespected every minority group. sit the fuck down stupid.

Brittany Rodriguez what group did he disrespect, and can you show me a link or two, or is that just what you heard ? Cuz I've NEVER heard him insult or disrespect anyone but the people who have insulted and disrespected him first, and dont give me the BULLSHIT that you would'nt do the same IDIOT!
Isn't that what Trump did to that military family and miss universe contestant?

Darmon - remember when he mocked/insulted a disabled reporter simply for doing his job...those of us that don't have the "sheep mentality" definitely remember. Along with the countless others, that's just the most memorable one I could think of.
yea that disabled reporter was asking for it i guess. what a stupid sumbitch.
So this is okay but what Eminem did wasn't? Okay.
